notes: This is a large ground-floor or basement-level apartment with outdoor courtyard access via metal stairs. The interior has dated decor with exposed wiring and cables along the walls, a decorative fireplace facade, and unfurnished rooms. Major baby safety concerns include the steep outdoor metal staircase with wide railings, the open courtyard area, and exposed cables. Limited natural light due to frosted windows and below-grade position. The bathroom is clean but dated with a bathtub.
